articles.title: NASA warns flooding will soon get a lot worse - thanks to the Moon and climate change - Daily Express
articles.description: COASTAL flooding is due to get considerably worse next decade, according to a new NASA study. The culprit? Climate change paired with the effect of the Moon's orbit on Earth.
